summary: Report detailing the establishment of a live address for Gladys G. DANBRUNT at 5611 Jason Street, Cheverly, Maryland. The householder and family members were briefed to accept communications for Mrs. DANBRUNT and to handle inquiries in a specific manner. The report also mentions a Western Union telegram sent to Eustace DANBRUNT in Cuba and efforts to notify the local Post Offices.
title: Live address established for Gladys G. DANBRUNT at Cheverly, Maryland
